title: Pune: Forest Department Debunks Viral Tiger Photo From Junnar, Confirms AI Forgery
description: Upon inquiry, Forest Department officials investigated the matter and identified the individual who shared the image, Dattatray Vinayak Minde of Mangrul, who confirmed that the said image is not real, but a forged image created using Artificial Intelligence (AI).
content:
Pune: It has come to the notice of the Forest Department that an image of a tiger allegedly seen in a farm field at Mangrul, Taluka Junnar, Dist. Pune is being widely circulated on various social media platforms.
Upon inquiry, Forest Department offic... [744 chars]

title: Intel’s AI Leader Sachin Katti Joins OpenAI, To Focus On Artificial General Intelligence
description: Sachin Katti, who was serving as Intel’s chief technology and artificial intelligence officer, is exiting the semiconductor company to join OpenAI, the maker of ChatGPT. He plans to focus on expanding OpenAI’s computing infrastructure aimed at artificial general intelligence, which is a conceptual type of AI comparable to human-level intellect, as detailed in his post on X.
content:
Sachin Katti, who was serving as Intel’s chief technology and artificial intelligence officer, is exiting the semiconductor company to join OpenAI, the maker of ChatGPT.

title: Practical Framework for Improving Reliability of AI Coding Assistants
description: As artificial intelligence tools are gaining traction across industries, their use by modern engineering professionals as standard equipment in their work is also getting normalized. title: Deloitte caught in false claim it owned up to AI in tainted report
description: The employment department rebuked Deloitte for claiming it had owned up to artificial intelligence use, prompting correction from consultancy to another department.

title: SoftBank earnings report 2Q
description: SoftBank's stock has slumped in the past week as concerns of an artificial intelligence bubble sent jitters through global markets.
content:
